snippet.title: [x68000] Akazukin Cha Cha 赤ずきん - Longplay
snippet.description:
Akazukin cha cha is a nice shooter for the sharp x68000 developed by sprite team.
Litterally akazukin means little red riding hood.
Basically this is a traditional horizontal cute em up.
You can shoot, drop bombs and use turning balls to destroy barriers.
When you kill enemies they release blue spheres , and if you collect them you fire power increases up to a maximum of 6 energy bars.
There is also a PC version of the game (as for all games of sprite team), but for some reason (probably copyright issues) the name has been changed in hisyou.
The game it's pretty fun, recommended.
